data.message:
Ask and you shall receive, ok then, why are Americans guilty of war crimes (aka dropping the atomic bomb on civilians) and have committed human rights violations and yet they are not acknowledging these crimes and human rights violations but then point the finger at other nations and claim war crimes and human rights violations by these other nations?  what the word for people like this? 
I use the word cowards, but I'm sure there are other words to describe this kind of behaviour by the USA government and its military.
